#A table showing plugins and when they were introduced

|| Plugin Name    || Description || First Version || Config Type ||
|| envvar         || Reads proxy configuration from an environmental variable || 0.1 || None ||
|| gnome          || Reads proxy configuration from GConf || 0.1 || Session ||
|| mozjs          || Uses Mozilla JavaScript to run PAC files || 0.1 || N/A ||
|| file           || Reads proxy configuration from a file || 0.2 || User & System ||
|| kde            || Reads proxy configuration from kioslaverc || 0.2 || Session ||
|| networkmanager || Automatically notifies libproxy when the network has changed || 0.2 || N/A ||
